Explore our articles to master the art of collage making and create stunning visuals for any occasion.

tool.blurred_frame.title: Blurred Frame
tool.blurred_frame.desc: Transform images with stunning blurred frames. Perfect for Instagram, stories, and social media posts.
tool.blurred_frame.meta.description: Add beautiful blurred borders around your images. Perfect for Instagram, stories, and social media posts. Adjust frame width and blur intensity with simple sliders.
tool.blurred_frame.meta.keywords: blurred frame, image border blur, blurred border, photo frame blur, social media frame, Instagram frame, blurred background frame
tool.blurred_frame.drop_hint: or drop images here or paste
tool.blurred_frame.tip: üí° Quick Tip: You can drag the image within the frame to adjust its position.
tool.blurred_frame.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
tool.blurred_frame.faq.a1: Blurred Frame is a free online tool that adds beautiful blurred borders around your images. Create stunning visual effects perfect for social media posts, Instagram stories, and professional photography presentations.
tool.blurred_frame.faq.a2: Upload your image and adjust the frame width and blur intensity with simple sliders. The tool automatically creates a blurred extension of your image around the edges, maintaining the original aspect ratio while adding an artistic border effect.
tool.blurred_frame.faq.a3: Ideal for Instagram posts, Facebook images, and any platform where you want to preserve your image's full content without cropping. The blurred frame fills the space beautifully while keeping focus on your main subject.
tool.blurred_frame.faq.a4: Control both the frame width (5-40% of image) and blur amount (1-100) to achieve your desired look. From subtle soft borders to dramatic blurred edges, create the perfect frame for any image style.
tool.blurred_frame.faq.a5: Download your framed images in JPEG, PNG, or WEBP format with customizable sizes up to original resolution. All processing happens in your browser - your images never leave your device.
tool.blurred_frame.faq.a6: Completely free with no watermarks, signup requirements, or hidden fees. Process unlimited images with full quality and all customization options available at no cost.

tool.square_crop.meta.keywords: square crop, image cropper, 1:1 ratio, online crop tool, square image maker, social media crop, square photo creator, free image cropper
tool.square_crop.title: Square Crop 1:1
tool.square_crop.subtitle: Easily transform images into perfect square 1:1 ratio. Perfect for social media profiles, Instagram posts, and any platform requiring square visuals. Adjust zoom and position for precise cropping control.
tool.square_crop.upload.text: Drag & drop an image here or click to upload

tool.square_crop.editor.tip: üí° Tip: Drag the image within the square frame to adjust the crop position, and use the zoom slider for precise control.
tool.square_crop.settings.title: Crop Settings
tool.square_crop.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
tool.square_crop.faq.a1: Square Crop 1:1 is a free online tool that crops your images to a perfect square (1:1 aspect ratio). Perfect for profile pictures, Instagram posts, and any platform that requires square images.
tool.square_crop.faq.a2: Upload your image and use the zoom slider to adjust the crop area. Drag the image to reposition it within the square frame. The tool ensures your image is cropped to a perfect 1:1 ratio while giving you full control over what to keep in frame.
tool.square_crop.faq.a3: Ideal for Instagram profile pictures, Facebook avatars, Twitter images, and any platform where square images are required. No more awkward crops or stretched images.
tool.square_crop.faq.a4: Simply zoom and drag to position your image perfectly. The visual preview shows exactly what your final square crop will look like before you download.
tool.square_crop.faq.a5: Download your square-cropped images in JPEG, PNG, or WEBP format with customizable sizes. All processing happens in your browser - your images never leave your device.
tool.square_crop.faq.a6: Completely free with no watermarks, signup requirements, or hidden fees. Crop unlimited images with full quality and all customization options available at no cost.
tool.square.meta.title: Square Image - Free Online Image Squaring Tool
tool.square.meta.description: Convert images to square shape online for free. Choose from blur background, solid color, resize, or crop modes. Perfect for social media posts, profile pictures, and more.
tool.square.meta.keywords: square image, make image square, convert to square, square photo, social media square, online square maker, square background
tool.square.title: Square Image
tool.square.subtitle: Convert images to square shape online for free
tool.square.upload.text: Drag & drop an image here or click to upload
tool.square.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
tool.square.faq.a1: Square Image is a free online tool that converts any photo into a perfect square format. Perfect for social media profile pictures, Instagram posts, thumbnails, and more. Choose from blur backgrounds, solid colors, resize, or crop options.
tool.square.faq.q2: Can I make my image square without cropping?
tool.square.faq.a2: Yes! Use the "Square with blur" or "Square with color" modes to make your image square without losing any part of the original photo. These modes add a blurred or colored background to fill the square space, keeping your entire image intact and centered.
tool.square.faq.q3: How do I convert rectangle to square?
tool.square.faq.a3: Converting rectangular images to square is easy with four methods: blur background (keeps entire image with artistic blur), color background (adds solid color borders), resize (fits image to square by stretching), or crop (select the portion you want). Choose the method that best fits your needs.
tool.square.faq.q4: How does the blur background work?
tool.square.faq.a4: The blur background tool creates smooth, professional-looking backgrounds by blurring your original image and using it as the background. Your original image stays sharp and clear in the center while the blurred version fills the square canvas. Adjust the blur intensity with the slider to achieve your perfect look.
tool.square.faq.q5: How do I make a square image for Instagram?
tool.square.faq.a5: Upload your photo, choose any of the four tools (blur, color, resize, or crop), adjust settings to your preference, and download. The default 1200px size is perfect for Instagram posts and profile pictures. All Instagram-ready formats are supported: JPEG, PNG, and WEBP.
tool.square.faq.a6: Upload JPG, PNG, WEBP, and most common image formats. All processing happens in your browser - your images never leave your device. Download your squared image as high-quality JPEG, PNG with full transparency support, or modern WEBP format.
tool.square.faq.q7: What is the best square size for social media?
tool.square.faq.a7: The recommended size is 1200x1200px for most platforms including Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Twitter. For YouTube thumbnails, 1080x1080px works well. You can also choose "Original" to maintain your photo's quality or set a custom size up to 10000px for professional use.
tool.square.faq.q8: Is this tool free to use?
tool.square.faq.a8: Yes, completely free with no watermarks, signup requirements, or hidden fees. Process unlimited images with full quality downloads. All features including blur backgrounds, color backgrounds, resize, and crop tools are available to everyone at no cost.
tool.rounded_corners.meta.title: Rounded Corners - Free Online Image Corner Rounding Tool

tool.rounded_corners.meta.keywords: rounded corners, image rounded corners, round corners online, corner rounding tool, rounded image, online corner editor, rounded photo
tool.rounded_corners.title: Rounded Corners
tool.rounded_corners.subtitle: Add customizable rounded corners to your images with transparent backgrounds. Perfect for modern web design, profile pictures, UI elements, and app icons.
tool.rounded_corners.upload.text: Drag & drop an image here or click to upload
tool.rounded_corners.settings.title: Settings
tool.rounded_corners.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
tool.rounded_corners.faq.a1: Rounded Corners is a free online tool that adds customizable rounded corners to your images with transparent backgrounds. Perfect for modern UI design, profile pictures, app icons, and web graphics that need that polished, contemporary look.
tool.rounded_corners.faq.a2: Upload your image and use the corner radius slider to adjust how rounded you want the corners (0% for square, 50% for circular). The tool outputs images with transparency outside the rounded shape, making them perfect for overlaying on any background.
tool.rounded_corners.faq.a3: Rounded corners are essential in modern web and app design. Create sleek profile pictures, stylish UI elements, app icons with rounded corners, or any graphic that needs smooth, contemporary edges instead of sharp 90-degree angles.
tool.rounded_corners.faq.a4: Simply upload your image, adjust the corner radius slider, and download. The live preview shows exactly how your rounded image will look. From subtle rounding to perfect circles at 50%, you have complete control.
tool.rounded_corners.faq.a5: Download as PNG with transparent corners, or choose JPEG/WEBP if you prefer a solid background. The transparent PNG option makes it easy to use your rounded images anywhere without worrying about backgrounds.
tool.rounded_corners.faq.a6: Completely free with no watermarks, signup requirements, or hidden fees. Add rounded corners to unlimited images with full quality and all customization options available at no cost.

tool.remove_bg.meta.title: AI Background Remover - Free Online AI Image Background Removal
tool.remove_bg.meta.description: Remove image backgrounds instantly for free using AI. Our browser-based AI background remover ensures your photos never leave your device. Download high-quality PNGs with transparent backgrounds.
tool.remove_bg.meta.keywords: remove background, AI background remover, transparent background, background removal, free background remover, online AI tool, remove bg online
tool.remove_bg.upload.text: Drag & drop an image here or click to upload
tool.remove_bg.upload.hint: AI processing works best with clear subjects (people, products, animals)
tool.remove_bg.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
tool.remove_bg.faq.q1: How does the AI Background Remover work?
tool.remove_bg.faq.a1: Our tool uses advanced AI models (running directly in your browser) to identify the main subject of your photo and remove the background. This process is 100% private as your images are never uploaded to any server.
tool.remove_bg.faq.a2: Yes, it is completely free to use with no hidden costs, no watermarks, and no registration required.
tool.remove_bg.faq.a3: Images with a clear distinction between the subject and the background work best. People, products, animals, and cars usually yield the best results.
tool.remove_bg.faq.a4: Privacy is our priority. Unlike other tools, MeCollage's AI background remover runs entirely on your local device. Your photos stay on your computer.
tool.remove_bg.faq.a5: The output is a high-quality PNG image with a transparent background, ready for use in your collages or other designs.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: MeCollage is a free online image collage maker that allows you to create beautiful collages with unlimited images. It offers professional layout options, customization features, and support for up to 20 photos per collage.
faq.q2: How do I create a collage?
faq.a2: Simply click or drag and drop your photos into the upload area. Once uploaded, your images will be automatically arranged into a collage. You can then customize the layout, add filters, text, or stickers to perfect your design.
faq.q3: How many images can I add?
faq.a3: You can add up to 20 images per collage. The tool supports various formats including PNG, JPG, and HEIC.
faq.a4: MeCollage supports multiple aspect ratios including 1:1, 4:5, 9:16, 3:4, and 16:9, allowing you to create collages optimized for different platforms and purposes.
faq.a5: Yes! You can adjust the gutter spacing between images, add rounded corners, apply various filters, insert text, and add emoji stickers to personalize your collage. The intuitive toolbar at the bottom of the canvas gives you quick access to all these features.
faq.q6: How do I export my collage?
faq.a6: Once you're satisfied with your collage, you can export it using the export functionality. The tool uses html2canvas to generate a high-quality image of your collage for download.
faq.a7: Yes, MeCollage is completely free to use. You can create unlimited collages without any watermarks, signup requirements, or hidden fees.
about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about MeCollage's mission, values, and story
about.welcome_p1: MeCollage is a free online image collage maker designed to help you create beautiful photo collages quickly and easily. Our mission is to provide a simple, powerful, and privacy-focused tool that anyone can use to transform their photos into stunning visual stories.
about.welcome_p2: Whether you're preserving family memories, creating social media content, or designing a portfolio, MeCollage gives you the tools to create professional-looking collages without the complexity of expensive software.
about.story_p1: We launched MeCollage in 2025 with a simple goal: to make photo collage creation accessible to everyone. We believe that everyone should be able to preserve and share their memories beautifully, without needing expensive software or technical expertise.
about.story_p2: We noticed that many existing collage tools were either too complicated for casual users or lacked essential features. Some required downloads, while others had intrusive ads or privacy concerns. We set out to create a tool that addressed all these issues.
about.story_p3: Today, MeCollage continues to evolve based on user feedback, with a focus on simplicity, performance, and privacy. We're committed to keeping our tool free and accessible to everyone.
about.offer_20_photos_desc: Create collages with up to 20 photos, perfect for showcasing multiple memories.
about.offer_ratios_desc: Choose from 1:1, 4:5, 9:16, 3:4, and 16:9 ratios for any platform.
about.offer_design_desc: Adjust spacing, rounded corners, and other design elements.
about.offer_filters_desc: Enhance your photos with various filters and effects.
about.offer_text_stickers_desc: Add text and fun stickers to personalize your collages.
about.offer_privacy_desc: All processing happens locally in your browser - no data sent to servers.
about.value_privacy_desc: All processing happens locally in your browser. Your photos never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy and security.
about.value_simplicity_desc: An easy-to-use interface that anyone can master in minutes, without sacrificing powerful features.
about.value_quality_desc: Professional-grade results without the professional price tag. We strive for excellence in every aspect of our tool.
about.value_accessibility_desc: Free for everyone, everywhere. No hidden fees, no watermarks, no signup required.
about.tech_desc: MeCollage is built using cutting-edge web technologies to ensure a fast, reliable, and secure experience:
about.tech_list_1: Built with modern web technologies (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript)
about.tech_list_2: No server-side photo processing - everything happens in your browser
about.tech_list_4: Works on all devices with a web browser
about.tech_list_5: Regular updates to improve performance and add new features
about.tech_list_6: AI Background Removal running entirely in the browser using WebAssembly
about.cta_desc: Join thousands of users who have already discovered the joy of easy collage creation with MeCollage.
contact.title: Contact & Support
contact.subtitle: Find help and connect with our community
contact.support_desc: MeCollage is a free, community-supported project. While we don't offer direct email support, you can connect with us through our community channels.
contact.github_desc: Report bugs & request features on our GitHub repository
contact.quick_help_desc: Need immediate assistance? Check out these resources:
contact.about_p1: MeCollage is an open-source, client-side photo collage tool. We believe in privacy, simplicity, and free access to creative tools.
contact.about_p2: Our mission is to provide an easy-to-use, powerful collage maker that respects your privacy and gives you full control over your creations.
faq.a8: No. All photo processing happens locally in your browser. Your photos never leave your device.
faq.a9: We support PNG, JPG, and HEIC formats.
faq.q10: Can I use MeCollage on mobile devices?
faq.a10: Yes, MeCollage works on any device with a web browser, including smartphones and tablets.
faq.a11: Make sure you have uploaded at least 2 photos. Try using a different browser or clearing your browser cache.
faq.q12: Can I use collages created with MeCollage commercially?
faq.a12: Yes! You own the collages you create. Use them however you like.
faq.q13: Will MeCollage add watermarks to my images?
faq.a13: No. MeCollage never adds watermarks to your collages.
faq.q14: How do I change the aspect ratio?
faq.a14: Use the "Aspect Ratio" buttons in the sidebar (1:1, 4:5, 9:16, 3:4, 16:9).
faq.a15: Absolutely. All processing happens locally in your browser. We don't collect or store your personal data.
policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.privacy.intro.title: 1. Introduction
policy.privacy.intro.text: Welcome to MeCollage. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, use our services, or interact with us. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, please do not access the site.
policy.privacy.collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
policy.privacy.collect.personal.title: 2.1 Personal Information
policy.privacy.collect.personal.text: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you visit our website, register for an account, or use our services. This information may include:
policy.privacy.collect.personal.list.1: Your name and contact information (if you choose to provide it)
policy.privacy.collect.personal.list.2: Email address (if you subscribe to our newsletter or contact us)
policy.privacy.collect.personal.list.3: User-generated content (such as images you upload to create collages)
policy.privacy.collect.non_personal.text: We may also collect non-personal information automatically when you visit our website. This information may include:
policy.privacy.collect.non_personal.list: Pages viewed and time spent on our website
policy.privacy.use.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
policy.privacy.use.text: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:
policy.privacy.use.list.1: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
policy.privacy.use.list.2: To process and complete your requests
policy.privacy.use.list.3: To personalize your experience on our website
policy.privacy.use.list.4: To communicate with you, including responding to your inquiries
policy.privacy.use.list.5: To analyze usage patterns and improve our website
policy.privacy.use.list.6: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues
policy.privacy.store.title: 4. How We Store Your Information
policy.privacy.store.text1: We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, please note that no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
policy.privacy.store.text2: For image processing, all images you upload are processed locally in your browser and are not stored on our servers unless explicitly stated otherwise.
policy.privacy.store.retention.title: 2.3 Data Retention
policy.privacy.store.retention.text: Since we do not store your images on our servers, there is no data retention period for user-uploaded content. All image processing occurs locally in your browser. We may retain server logs for up to 30 days for security and analytics purposes.
policy.privacy.sharing.title: 5. Third-Party Sharing
policy.privacy.sharing.text1: We do not share, sell, rent, or trade your personal information with third parties for their commercial purposes. However, we may disclose your information in the following circumstances:
policy.privacy.sharing.list.1: To comply with legal requirements or respond to lawful requests
policy.privacy.sharing.list.2: To protect our rights, property, or safety, and that of our users and the public
policy.privacy.sharing.list.3: With service providers who assist us in operating our website and providing our services
policy.privacy.sharing.text2: Since all image processing happens locally in your browser and we don't require user registration, we do not collect or store any personal information. We do not sell, rent, or trade user data because we don't collect it in the first place.
policy.privacy.rights.title: 6. Your Rights
policy.privacy.rights.text1: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:
policy.privacy.rights.list.1: The right to access your personal information
policy.privacy.rights.list.2: The right to request correction of inaccurate information
policy.privacy.rights.list.3: The right to request deletion of your personal information
policy.privacy.rights.list.4: The right to opt out of certain uses of your information
policy.privacy.rights.text2_pre_link: To exercise these rights, please visit our
policy.privacy.cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
policy.privacy.cookies.text: We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. Cookies are small data files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. You can control cookies through your browser settings.
policy.privacy.changes.title: 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
policy.privacy.changes.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
policy.privacy.support.title: 9. Support
policy.privacy.support.text_post_link: to report bugs or request features.
policy.terms.title: Terms of Service
policy.terms.intro.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
policy.terms.intro.text: By accessing or using the MeCollage website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our website or services.
policy.terms.service.title: 2. Service Description
policy.terms.service.text: MeCollage provides an online platform for creating and editing image collages. Our services include, but are not limited to, collage creation, image editing, and image export. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our services at any time without notice.
policy.terms.user.title: 3. User Responsibilities
policy.terms.user.text: When using our services, you agree to:
policy.terms.user.list.1: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
policy.terms.user.list.2: Respect the intellectual property rights of others
policy.terms.user.list.3: Not upload or transmit any content that is illegal, harmful, or infringes on the rights of others
policy.terms.user.list.4: Not use our services for any commercial purpose without our prior written consent
policy.terms.user.list.5: Maintain the security of your account (if applicable)
policy.terms.user.list.6: Not attempt to interfere with the proper functioning of our services
policy.terms.user.list.7: Not use any automated means to access our services
policy.terms.ip.title: 4. Intellectual Property
policy.terms.ip.text1: All content and materials on the MeCollage website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, and software, are the property of MeCollage or its licensors and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
policy.terms.ip.text2: You retain ownership of any images you upload to our services. By uploading images, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, modify, and display your images for the purpose of providing our services to you.
policy.terms.ip.text3: MeCollage is an open-source project. The source code is available for review and contribution. The collages you create using MeCollage belong to you, and you have full rights to use them for any purpose, including commercial use.
policy.terms.privacy.title: 5. Privacy Policy
policy.terms.privacy.text: Your use of our services is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms of Service by reference. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.
policy.terms.warranties.title: 6. Disclaimer of Warranties
policy.terms.warranties.text1: Our services are provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant that our services will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.
policy.terms.warranties.text2: We make no warranties regarding the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of any content or materials on our website.
policy.terms.liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
policy.terms.liability.text1: In no event shall MeCollage or its directors, officers, employees, or agents be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our services, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.
policy.terms.liability.text2: Our total liability to you for all claims arising out of or in connection with these Terms of Service or our services shall not exceed the amount you paid (if any) to use our services.
policy.terms.indemnification.title: 8. Indemnification
policy.terms.indemnification.text: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless MeCollage and its directors, officers, employees, and agents from and against any and all claims, damages, liabilities, costs, and expenses arising out of or in connection with your use of our services, your violation of these Terms of Service, or your violation of the rights of any third party.
policy.terms.termination.title: 9. Termination
policy.terms.termination.text1: We may terminate or suspend your access to our services at any time, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms of Service.
policy.terms.termination.text2: Upon termination, your right to use our services will immediately cease.
policy.terms.changes.title: 10. Changes to These Terms
policy.terms.changes.text1: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms of Service on this page. You are advised to review these Terms of Service periodically for any changes.
policy.terms.changes.text2: Your continued use of our services after the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of the revised Terms of Service.
policy.terms.law.title: 11. Governing Law
policy.terms.law.text: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of California, United States, without regard to its conflict of law principles.
policy.terms.dispute.title: 12. Dispute Resolution
policy.terms.dispute.text: Any dispute arising out of or in connection with these Terms of Service or our services shall be resolved through amicable negotiation. If negotiation fails, the dispute shall be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of California, United States.

blog.custom_grid.title: Custom Grid Layout: Personalize Your Collage Arrangements
blog.custom_grid.excerpt: Discover the power of custom grid layouts in MeCollage. Learn how to manually set rows and columns to create unique photo arrangements that perfectly fit your creative vision.
blog.custom_grid.intro: We're excited to announce the new Custom Grid Layout feature in MeCollage! While our auto-layout is great for quick creations, sometimes you need more control. Now, you can specify exactly how many rows and columns your collage should have.
blog.custom_grid.how_to_title: How to Use Custom Grid Layout
blog.custom_grid.step2: 2. In the Sidebar, look for the 'Grid Layout' section.
blog.custom_grid.step4: 4. Enter your desired Rows and Columns (e.g., 2x3, 4x5).
blog.custom_grid.step5: 5. Click 'Apply' to see your new layout instantly!
blog.custom_grid.benefit1: Precise Control: Match your layout to the exact number of photos you have.
blog.custom_grid.benefit2: Creative Freedom: Experiment with unconventional grids like 1x5 or 5x1.
blog.custom_grid.benefit3: Professional Look: Ensure all photos are the same size and perfectly aligned.
blog.ai_enhancements.title: MeCollage Pro: A New Era of AI-Powered Collage Creation
blog.ai_enhancements.excerpt: Explore the new AI enhancements in MeCollage Pro. From Smart Face Centering to High-Precision Local Background Removal, discover how we're making professional design accessible to everyone while keeping your data 100% private.
blog.ai_enhancements.intro: We are thrilled to unveil a significant leap forward for MeCollage: the integration of advanced AI enhancements. These features are designed to solve common design frustrations and empower you to create studio-quality collages in seconds. Built on cutting-edge browser technologies like WebAssembly and multi-threaded acceleration, our AI runs entirely on your device‚Äîno uploads, no privacy compromises.
blog.ai_enhancements.face_center_title: Smart Face Centering: Never Miss a Smile
blog.ai_enhancements.face_center_desc: One of the most tedious parts of collage making is ensuring everyone's face is visible in cropped cells. Our Smart Face Centering uses a neural network to detect faces across all your photos and automatically adjusts the focal point so every smile is perfectly aligned and centered within its cell.
blog.ai_enhancements.bg_removal_desc: Creating product-focused or artistic collages often requires removing distracting backgrounds. We've integrated a high-precision 'Medium' AI model that delivers professional-grade segmentation. Whether it's complex product edges or portrait outlines, you can now generate transparent PNGs instantly without ever leaving the editor.
blog.ai_enhancements.privacy_desc: At MeCollage, we believe your photos belong to you. Unlike other AI tools that process your images on distant servers, our AI features run entirely within your browser. By leveraging GPU acceleration and local inference, we ensure that your creative process is both blazing fast and completely private.
blog.ai_enhancements.face_center_how_to: 1. Click the ü§ñ button in the bottom toolbar to open the AI panel; 2. Click the 'Apply to All Photos' button; 3. The system will automatically analyze all images and center faces within their cells.
blog.ai_enhancements.bg_removal_how_to: 1. Click to select the photo you want to process on the canvas; 2. Click the ü§ñ button in the bottom toolbar (if the panel isn't already open); 3. Click the 'Remove Background' button; 4. Wait a few seconds for the background to become transparent.
blog.ai_enhancements.performance_desc: To make these complex AI models run smoothly, we've implemented Cross-Origin Isolation and multi-threaded WebAssembly. This allows the AI to use all available cores of your CPU, cutting processing time by up to 80% compared to standard browser implementations.
blog.how_to.title: How to Make Photo Collages: Complete Step-by-Step Guide
blog.how_to.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of creating beautiful photo collages with our comprehensive step-by-step guide. From selecting the perfect images to arranging them in an eye-catching layout, this guide covers every aspect of the collage-making process.
blog.design_tips.title: 10 Collage Design Tips for Beginners
blog.design_tips.excerpt: Just starting out with collage making? These 10 essential design tips will help you create professional-looking collages from day one. Learn about composition, color theory, and layout techniques.
blog.holiday.title: Creating Holiday Collages: Step-by-Step Tutorial
blog.holiday.excerpt: Capture the magic of holidays with beautiful collages that tell your story. This step-by-step tutorial will guide you through creating festive collages for Christmas, Thanksgiving, birthdays, and other special occasions.
blog.mobile.title: Mobile Collage Making Tips & Tricks
blog.mobile.excerpt: Create stunning collages on the go with these mobile-friendly tips and tricks. Learn how to optimize your workflow for mobile devices and edit your collages directly from your smartphone.
blog.social_media.title: Social Media Collage Guide: Instagram, Facebook, Twitter
blog.social_media.excerpt: Create engaging collages optimized for each social media platform. This guide covers the best practices for Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and more. Learn about platform-specific dimensions and layout ideas.
blog.portfolio.title: Portfolio Collage Tips for Photographers and Designers
blog.portfolio.excerpt: Showcase your work professionally with portfolio collages. Learn how to curate your best pieces, create cohesive layouts, and design collages that highlight your unique style.
blog.design_tips.intro: Creating a stunning photo collage is more than just putting a few images together. It's about design principles, composition, and storytelling. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refine your skills, these 10 essential collage design tips will help you create visually appealing collages that stand out. Let's dive in!
blog.design_tips.p_art: Collage making is a creative process that combines multiple images into a single cohesive piece. Great collages tell stories, evoke emotions, and showcase your unique style. While there are no hard and fast rules, understanding basic design principles can take your collages from ordinary to extraordinary.
blog.design_tips.p_ratio: The aspect ratio is the first and most fundamental design choice you'll make for your collage. It determines the overall shape and how your collage will be displayed across different platforms.
blog.design_tips.h3_spacing: 2. Use Spacing to Create Breathing Room
blog.design_tips.p_spacing: The space between images, known as the gutter, is a powerful design tool. It creates visual breathing room and helps separate different elements in your collage.
blog.design_tips.h3_corners: 3. Soften Your Design with Rounded Corners
blog.design_tips.p_corners: Rounded corners can transform the feel of your collage, making it appear more approachable and modern.
blog.design_tips.p_harmony: Color harmony is essential for creating a cohesive collage. When selecting photos, consider their color schemes and how they'll work together.
blog.design_tips.h3_story: 5. The Order of Photos Tells a Story
blog.design_tips.p_story: The sequence of images in your collage can create a narrative and guide the viewer's eye. Think about the story you want to tell.
blog.design_tips.h3_negative: 6. Master the Art of Negative Space
blog.design_tips.p_negative: Negative space, or the empty space around and between elements in your collage, is just as important as the images themselves.
blog.design_tips.h3_filters: 7. Use Filters to Unify Your Style
blog.design_tips.p_filters: Filters are a powerful tool for creating a consistent look and feel across your collage. They can unify photos with different lighting or color tones.
blog.design_tips.p_text: When adding text to your collage, less is often more. Use short, impactful text that enhances your images.
blog.design_tips.p_stickers: Stickers can add personality and fun to your collage, but they should enhance, not distract from, your main content.
blog.design_tips.p_export: The final step in creating your collage is exporting it, and choosing the right quality is essential for how it will be displayed.
blog.design_tips.p_summary: By following these 10 collage design tips, you'll be well on your way to creating beautiful, professional-looking collages that captivate your audience. So grab your photos, open MeCollage, and start designing!
blog.holiday.intro: Holiday seasons are all about creating and sharing memories. Whether it's Christmas, New Year, Valentine's Day, or a birthday celebration, collages offer a wonderful way to capture the essence of these special moments. With MeCollage, you can easily create festive holiday collages that perfectly convey the joy and spirit of any occasion.
blog.holiday.li1: Memory Preservation: They allow you to compile multiple photos from a single event into a cohesive visual story.
blog.holiday.li2: Emotional Impact: Collages evoke stronger emotions than individual photos by showing the progression of an event.
blog.holiday.li3: Creative Expression: They provide a canvas to express your creativity and personal style.

blog.how_to.intro: Photo collages are a fantastic way to tell stories, showcase memories, and create visually stunning compositions from multiple images. Whether you're creating a collage for social media, a family album, or a professional portfolio, having the right tools can make all the difference.
blog.how_to.p_what_is: MeCollage is a free online photo collage maker that allows you to create beautiful collages with ease. Unlike many other collage tools that require downloads or subscriptions, MeCollage works entirely in your web browser.
blog.how_to.h2_guide: Step-by-Step Guide to Making a Photo Collage
blog.how_to.li_theme: Select photos that share a common theme, color scheme, or story.
blog.how_to.li_simple: Don't overcrowd your collage with too many elements. Sometimes less is more.
blog.mobile.intro: In today's fast-paced world, mobile devices have become our primary tools for capturing and sharing memories. MeCollage is designed to work seamlessly on mobile devices, giving you all the power of a desktop collage maker right in the palm of your hand.
blog.mobile.p_mobile_first: MeCollage is fully optimized for mobile devices, ensuring that you can create stunning collages anytime, anywhere. Our responsive design adapts perfectly to different screen sizes.

blog.mobile.h2_export: Exporting and Saving to Your Mobile Gallery
blog.portfolio.intro: For photographers, designers, and creative professionals, a well-crafted portfolio is essential for showcasing your work and attracting clients. Portfolio collages offer a dynamic way to present multiple pieces of your work in a single format.
blog.portfolio.h2_importance: The Importance of Professional Portfolio Collages
blog.portfolio.li_first: First Impressions Matter: A well-designed collage can immediately capture the attention of potential clients.
blog.portfolio.h2_platforms: Principle 3: Optimize for Behance and Dribbble
blog.social_media.intro: In the age of social media, visual content reigns supreme. Collages offer a powerful way to showcase multiple images in a single, eye-catching post. Each platform has its own preferred dimensions and ratios for optimal display.
blog.social_media.h2_dimensions: Understanding Social Media Dimensions and Ratios
